comment.comment-body: N. Wirth 1.7.97 / 8.3.2020 Oberon compiler for RISC in Oberon-07

Author: Niklaus Wirth, 2014. Parser of Oberon-RISC compiler. Uses Scanner ORS to obtain symbols (tokens), ORB for definition of data structures and for handling import and export, and ORG to produce binary code. ORP performs type checking and data allocation. Parser is target-independent, except for part of the handling of allocations.
